## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:**	[Solyc10g076290](https://solgenomics.net/locus/Solyc10g076290/view)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>SlRAE1</u>
- **Gene Name:** COI1 F-box domain-containing protein
- **Genome:** [Tomato Genome version SL4.0](https://solgenomics.net/organism/solanum_lycopersicum/genome)
- **Species:** *Solanum lycopersicum*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - SlSTOP1 from **SlRAE1**-mediated degradation to modulate aluminum resistance.
   - **SlRAE1**, an AtRAE1 homologue, was also activated by SlSTOP1.
   - **SlRAE1** functions as an E3-ligase, promoting the degradation of SlSTOP1 and SlSZP1.

## Function-related keywords:
   - [resistance](/tags/resistance/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[aluminum](/tags/aluminum/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[aluminum-resistance](/tags/aluminum-resistance/)

## Literature:
